summary: The main change between the old and new versions of the "National Archives of Australia - AI Policy" document is the addition of a brief announcement regarding scheduled maintenance for RecordSearch on August 14th, 2024, from 8 to 10 am AEST.  The core content of the AI policy document itself remains unchanged.
analysis: The difference is purely presentational and does not affect the policy's substance.  The announcement is a temporary notification unrelated to the policy's guidelines on AI record management.  The core document regarding AI technologies, record types, management principles, and retention policies remains identical.
